title: Knife, 1985-103-76, ca. 1621
inscribed: On side of handle: ELISABET LE BRUN on reverse side; Sans Dieu Rien. Anno 1622
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade, point broken of. Tapered handle with flat sides, openwork scrolls at the top of handle. Engraved figural design: one side "SUSANNA" and a woman in costume, the other side "S.CATHARI" and a man in costume playing the lute. Engraved on handle: "Elisabet * Le * Brun * Sans Dieu Rien. Anno.1.6.2.2."

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005
